snippet: Performing in a milonga, a casual gathering of tango dancers, Gabriel Missé and Analia Centurión offer a rare and intimate view of the form.
abstract: Alastair Macaulay reviews Argentine tango performance by Gabriel Misse and Analia Centurion at Dardo Galletto Studios.
lead_paragraph: Performing in a milonga, a casual gathering of tango dancers, Gabriel Missé and Analia Centurión offer a rare and intimate view of the form.

headline.seo: Gabriel Missé and Analia Centurión at Dardo Galletto Studios
headline.main: Away From Stage, the Tango Turns Revealing and Intoxicating
headline.print_headline: Away From Stage, the Tango Turns Revealing and Intoxicating
